description.value:
Trigger You fall at least 10 feet and land on a solid surface.

You slam into the ground, shattering it around you. Treat the fall as 10 feet shorter. You land on your feet. The ground in a @Template[emanation|distance:5] becomes difficult terrain. Any creature in the emanation when you land takes @Damage[5[bludgeoning]] damage as the debris hits it and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the start of its next turn.
